Key Match Events: Ryan Christie scored the opening goal.
Ché Adams scored a late second goal to seal the win.
Pre-Game Insights: Scotland needed to gain confidence and play time for fringe players.
Steve Clarke is concerned about further fitness issues in the squad.
Tommy Conway could receive a late European Championship call-up.
Post-Match Reflections: Scotland's manager is hopeful Liam Cooper will recover from his injury in a few days.
Clarke believes his team needs to improve their attacking potency.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at Estádio Algarve in Portugal.
Scotland controlled the first half but lacked attacking threat.
The second half saw a more decisive performance from Scotland.
Others: The absence of the Tartan Army supporters affected the atmosphere.
Grant Hanley almost scored a hat-trick but missed several chances.
